attributes.action: Get UK savers money back from Iceland particulaly Landsbanki's Icesave
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We ask the UK governemnt to apply all possible presure to the Icelandic government to honour all UK personal deposits in their banks. Including blocking any attempt of EU membership.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
